snippet: The exact math is probably not as important as the broader conclusion: that the economy is in line with President Obama being a very modest favorite.
abstract: The exact math is probably not as important as the broader conclusion: that the economy is in line with President Obama being a very modest favorite.

headline.main: Amid Volatile Polling, Keep an Eye on Election Fundamentals
headline.print_headline: Following the Job Numbers, as Well as Bouncing Polls
